name: Pong2D: CO-OP Edition
description:
Move your paddles in this 2-player game where both opposing players have to score 5 points to win a game of pong!

Controls

Player 1 (Left Paddle) - Press W or D to move Up or Down

Player 2 (Right Paddle) - Press UpArrow or DownArrow to move Up or Down

Press R to restart game
